data.title: english.scio.gov.cn
data.text:
Leaders July 5, 2024

Full text of Chinese president's signed article on Tajik media

A signed article by Chinese President Xi Jinping titled "Working Together for a Brighter Future of China-Tajikistan Relations" was published Friday on the Narodnaya Gazeta newspaper and the state-run Khovar News Agency upon his state visit to Tajikistan.

Leaders July 5, 2024

Xi's speech at 'Shanghai Cooperation Organization Plus' Meeting in Astana

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered a speech Thursday at "Shanghai Cooperation Organization Plus" meeting in Astana, Kazakhstan.

Leaders July 2, 2024

Full text: Chinese president's signed article in Kazakh media

Chinese President Xi Jinping published a signed article in the Kazakhstanskaya Pravda newspaper and Kazinform International News Agency on Tuesday under the title "Staying True to Our Shared Commitment and Opening a New Chapter in China-Kazakhstan Relations" ahead of his state visit to Kazakhstan.

Leaders June 28, 2024

Full text: Xi's address at conference marking 70th anniv. of Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered an important speech at the Conference Marking the 70th Anniversary of the Five Principles of Peaceful Coexistence on Friday in Beijing.

Leaders May 8, 2024

Full text of Xi's signed article in Serbian media

A signed article by Chinese President Xi Jinping titled "May the Light of Our Ironclad Friendship Shine on the Path of China-Serbia Cooperation" was published Tuesday in Serbian media Politika.

May 7, 2024

Full text of Xi's speech at closing ceremony of 6th meeting of China-France Business Council

Chinese President Xi Jinping on Monday delivered a speech in Paris at the closing ceremony of the Sixth Meeting of the China-France Business Council.

Leaders December 31, 2023

Full text of President Xi Jinping's 2024 New Year message

​On New Year's Eve, Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered his 2024 New Year message via China Media Group and the Internet.

Leaders December 14, 2023

Full text of Xi's speech at meeting with representatives of young Chinese, Vietnamese

The following is the full text of the speech by General Secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee and Chinese President Xi Jinping at a meeting with representatives of young Chinese and Vietnamese and people who have contributed to China-Vietnam friendship.

Leaders November 19, 2023

Full text of Xi's speech at the 30th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered a speech here Friday at the 30th APEC Economic Leaders' Meeting.

Leaders November 17, 2023

Full text of Xi's written speech at Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation CEO Summit

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered a written speech Thursday at the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) CEO Summit.

Leaders November 17, 2023

Full text of Xi's speech at Welcome Dinner by Friendly Organizations in the United States

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered a speech Wednesday at Welcome Dinner by Friendly Organizations in the United States.

Leaders November 22, 2023

Full text: Remarks by Chinese President Xi Jinping at the extraordinary joint meeting of BRICS leaders and leaders of invited BRICS members on the situation in the Middle East with particular reference to Gaza

Chinese President Xi Jinping on Tuesday addressed the extraordinary joint meeting of BRICS leaders and leaders of invited BRICS members on the situation in the Middle East with particular reference to Gaza.

Leaders October 19, 2023

Full text of Xi Jinping's keynote speech at 3rd Belt and Road Forum for Int'l Cooperation

Chinese President Xi Jinping on Wednesday delivered a keynote speech at the third Belt and Road Forum for International Cooperation.

Leaders September 25, 2023

Full text: Xi's remarks at welcoming banquet of Hangzhou Asiad opening ceremony

Chinese President Xi Jinping and his wife, Peng Liyuan, on Saturday hosted a banquet in Hangzhou, capital city of east China's Zhejiang Province, to welcome guests who will attend the opening ceremony of the 19th Asian Games.

Leaders September 10, 2023

Full text of Xi Jinping's letter to representatives of outstanding teachers

The following is the full text of Xi Jinping's letter to representatives of outstanding teachers.

Leaders August 26, 2023

Full text: Remarks by Chinese President Xi Jinping at China-Africa Leaders' Dialogue

​Chinese President Xi Jinping addressed the China-Africa Leaders' Dialogue in Johannesburg, South Africa on Aug. 24.

Leaders August 25, 2023

Full text: Remarks by President Xi at BRICS-Africa Outreach and BRICS Plus Dialogue

Chinese President Xi Jinping addressed the BRICS-Africa Outreach and BRICS Plus Dialogue on Aug. 24.

Leaders August 24, 2023

Full text: Remarks by Chinese President Xi Jinping at the 15th BRICS Summit

Chinese President Xi Jinping addressed the 15th BRICS Summit on Aug. 23.

Leaders August 21, 2023

Full text of Xi's signed article on S. African media

A signed article by Chinese President Xi Jinping titled "Sailing the Giant Ship of China-South Africa Friendship and Cooperation Toward Greater Success" was published Monday on South African media as he is going to attend the 15th BRICS Summit in Johannesburg and pay a state visit to South Africa.

Leaders July 28, 2023

Full text: Toast by President Xi at welcoming banquet of Chengdu Universiade opening ceremony

Chinese President Xi Jinping and his wife Peng Liyuan on Friday hosted a banquet in Chengdu, capital city of southwest China's Sichuan Province, to welcome guests attending the opening ceremony of the Chengdu FISU World University Games.

Leaders July 5, 2023

Full text of Xi's address at SCO summit

Chinese President Xi Jinping addressed the 23rd meeting of the Council of Heads of State of the Shanghai Cooperation Organization (SCO) via video conference in Beijing on Tuesday.

Leaders May 19, 2023

Full text of Xi Jinping's keynote speech at China-Central Asia Summit

Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday delivered a keynote speech at the China-Central Asia Summit held in the city of Xi'an, northwest China's Shaanxi Province.

Leaders March 16, 2023

Full text of Xi's keynote address at the CPC in Dialogue with World Political Parties High-level Meeting

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered a keynote address at the CPC in Dialogue with World Political Parties High-Level Meeting via video link on Wednesday.

Leaders March 15, 2023

Full text of Xi Jinping's speech at first session of 14th NPC

Chinese President Xi Jinping delivered a speech Monday morning at the first session of the 14th National People's Congress, the country's national legislature.

Leaders January 22, 2023

Full text of Xi Jinping's speech at 2023 Spring Festival gathering

Xi Jinping, general secretary of the Communist Party of China Central Committee, Chinese president and chairman of the Central Military Commission, delivered a speech at the Spring Festival gathering at the Great Hall of the People on Friday.

Leaders January 1, 2023

Full text: 2023 New Year Address by President Xi Jinping

On New Year's eve, President Xi Jinping delivered his 2023 New Year Address through China Media Group and the Internet.

Leaders December 16, 2022

Full text of Xi's address at the opening of the high-level segment of COP15 part 2

The following is the full text of the address delivered by Chinese President Xi Jinping at the opening ceremony of the high-level segment of the second part of the 15th meeting of the Conference of the Parties to the Convention on Biological Diversity (COP15) via videolink on Thursday.
